articles.author: Diksha Madhok, Sudhi Ranjan Sen
articles.title: Modi Seizes AI Summit to Assert India’s Global Ambitions After Tough Year - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Six months ago, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi was fending off verbal attacks from US President Donald Trump, trying to regain the upper hand over Pakistan after an armed conflict, and facing questions about his economy’s prospects.
